description: Don't know what to drink this Thanksgiving? Look no further! Here is a best-selling recipe for Hard Cider Spritz that will have your guests begging for more. It's the perfect cocktail to sip while you watch football on TV or chat with family members you haven't seen in a while.
name: Hard Cider Spritz

recipeInstructions.name: For each cocktail glass, pour 4 oz. hard cider, 1½ oz. apple cider, ½ oz. rye whiskey, ¼ oz. Aperol, and ¼ oz. lemon juice into a rocks glass filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: For each cocktail glass, pour 4 oz. hard cider, 1½ oz. apple cider, ½ oz. rye whiskey, ¼ oz. Aperol, and ¼ oz. lemon juice into a rocks glass filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off with club soda. Gently stir to combine and garnish with an apple slice.
